Package org.apache.kafka.common

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AlterConfigPolicy, ClientQuotaCallback, ConfigProvider, ConnectRestExtension, ConsumerInterceptor<K,V>, CreateTopicPolicy, DeserializationExceptionHandler, HeaderConverter, Partitioner, PrincipalBuilder, ProducerInterceptor<K,V>, ProductionExceptionHandler, Reconfigurable, Transformation<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPrincipalBuilder, DefaultProductionExceptionHandler, FileConfigProvider, LogAndContinueExceptionHandler, LogAndFailExceptionHandler, SimpleHeaderConverter, StringConverter

    public interface Configurable
    A Mix-in style interface for classes that are instantiated by reflection and need to take configuration parameters
